channel.title: Memory error.. [client]
channel.description:
little help with my error...
this is client sided not server sided..
[code] Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class30_Sub3.<init>(Class30_Sub3.java:7) at Class25.method279(Class25.java:161) at Class7.method171(Class7.java:244) at client.method22(client.java:480) at client.method54(client.java:2411) at client.method53(client.java:2359) at client.method62(client.java:2823) at client.method7(client.java:1868) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:115) at client.run(client.java:4333) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
